pr_title: Fold some of sig_terms into terms

timeline.message:
Fold some of sig_terms into terms

This merges the global-ordinals-based implementation for
`significant_terms` into the global-ordinals-based implementation of
`terms`, removing a bunch of copy and pasted code that is subtly
different across the two implementations and replacing it with an
explicit `ResultStrategy` with nice stuff like Javadoc.

The actual behavior is mostly unchanged, though I was able to remove a
redundant copy of bytes representing the string from the result
construction phase of `significant_terms`.

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Maybe run the formatter on this method declaration?
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Since the syntax backing this is somewhat rare in aggs, maybe toss a quick comment here that we need the reference to this in order to construct the closure?  I figured it out, but did a double take when I first saw it.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Nit: maybe update the javadoc to say this can only be used for StandardTerms?
timeline.author: not-napoleon
